name: RetroTS.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: Creates slice-based regressors for regressing out components of heart rate, respiration, and respiration volume per time using independent data files or BIDS formatted files.

inputs.description: Respiration data file
inputs.name: Respiration File

inputs.description: Cardiac data file
inputs.name: Cardiac File

inputs.description: Physiological signal sampling frequency in Hz
inputs.name: Physiological Sampling Frequency

inputs.description: Number of slices
inputs.name: Number of Slices

inputs.description: Volume TR in seconds
inputs.name: Volume TR

inputs.description: BIDS formatted physio file in tab-separated format, can be gzipped
inputs.name: BIDS Physio File

inputs.description: BIDS formatted physio metadata json file. If not specified, the json corresponding to the phys_file will be loaded.
inputs.name: BIDS Physio JSON

inputs.description: Prefix of output file
inputs.name: Output File Prefix

inputs.description: Vector of shifts in seconds of RVT signal. (default is [0:5:20])
inputs.name: RVT Shifts

inputs.description: Flag for writing RVT regressors (default is 1)
inputs.name: Write RVT Regressors Flag

inputs.description: Cut-off frequency in Hz for respiratory lowpass filter (default 3 Hz)
inputs.name: Respiratory Cut-off Frequency

inputs.description: Cut-off frequency in Hz for cardiac lowpass filter (default 3 Hz)
inputs.name: Cardiac Cut-off Frequency

inputs.description: Flag for writing Cardiac regressors (default is 1)
inputs.name: Write Cardiac Regressors Flag

inputs.description: Flag for writing Respiratory regressors (default is 1)
inputs.name: Write Respiratory Regressors Flag

inputs.description: Resampling kernel (default is 'linear')
inputs.name: Interpolation Style

inputs.description: Order of FIR filter (default is 40)
inputs.name: FIR Filter Order

inputs.description: Show talkative progress as the program runs (default is 1)
inputs.name: Quiet Mode

inputs.description: Run demonstration of RetroTS (default is 0)
inputs.name: Demo Mode

inputs.description: Show graphs (default is unset; set with any parameter to view)
inputs.name: Show Graphs

inputs.description: Drop into pdb upon an exception (default is False)
inputs.name: Debug Flag

inputs.description: Vector of slice acquisition time offsets in seconds (default is equivalent of alt+z)
inputs.name: Slice Offset

inputs.description: Unknown parameter (default is 1)
inputs.name: Slice Major

inputs.description: Slice timing information in seconds. (default is alt+z)
inputs.name: Slice Order

inputs.description: Zero phase offset flag
inputs.name: Zero Phase Offset

inputs.description: Specify the version of the original Matlab code's transformation (default is 0)
inputs.name: Legacy Transform

output-files.description: Output file containing respiratory and cardiac regressors
output-files.name: Output File
